message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1350000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1350000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1450000, which is a fair compromise. Let's meet in the middle!
Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I can't agree to $1450000. I would like to propose $1400000 as a compromise. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
